answers.author: [Unknown]
answers.text:
Hi Peni, 
Unfortunately I was unable to find something related to the specific programs you mentioned. However I did find an RFP that mentions providing discounted rates so you might be able to get some ideas from that. Hopefully in the next couple of days someone from California will be able to help you more specifically with your question. 
-RFP for Garbage and Recycling Services that discuses potential discount rates. 
icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/14921
Best, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org

author: Peni Basalusalu
text: In the process of negotiating new rates for refuse collection, I wonder if anyone especially in Northern California has had experience in mirroring the CARE program offered by PG&E as a way to qualify customers to the discount rates.
title: Garbage discount rates for seniors
